title: Motorbike Engines
description: A sound package of motorbike engines with 138 sound effects, designed in a realistic style.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/motorbike-engines-preview

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/j6fxcez14b31bjs/MSE%20-%20Motorbike%20Engines.pdf?dl=0


The collection includes sounds for each vehicle:

  • 12 fast and 12 slow acceleration sounds
  • 12 fast and 12 slow deceleration sounds
  • 30 seamless loops of engine rpm sounds at five speeds - idle, low rpm, mid rpm, high and very high rpm
  • 48 transition sounds between speeds
  • 6 start engine and 6 stop engine sounds


A total of 6 motorbikes in the set. All sounds have been created in a realistic style, using realistic motorbike sounds in the design.


This package is perfect for creating engine roar sounds for realistic motorbikes, including sport bikes. It can also be used to create futuristic light vehicles. Enjoy!


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 138 game-ready sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • 6 motorbikes in total
  • 5 types of engine rpm - idle, low, medium, high, very high
  • 30 seamless loops of engine rpm sounds in total
  • 24 acceleration sounds, 24 deceleration sounds
  • 48 transition sounds between engine rpm
  • 6 start engine and 6 stop engine sounds
  • perfect for the game genres of simulation, adventure, strategy and more


Number of Audio Waves: 138

Number of Audio Cues: 138

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 17 minutes 06 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
